thread.title: TMC ignores communal tension in local schools in Bengal | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: TMC ignores communal tension in local schools in Bengal | Daily Mail Online

title: TMC ignores communal tension in local schools in Bengal | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad Tinderbox Bengal: Mamata led TMC continues to ignore the plight of local schools which face communal tension over celebration of Saraswati Puja and Nabi dibas (prophet's birthday) Schools near Kolkata were not allowed to celebrate Saraswati Puja by Islamic fringe groups The Islamist groups allegedly want the schools to celebrate Prophet Muhammad's birthday Opposition leaders claim that the state is slowly slipping into the hands of Islamist fringe Mamata led TMC chooses to ignore the increasing communal tensions See more news from India at www.dailymail.co.uk/indiahome 59 shares
